title: "SoundTech AI gets acquired, trails ‘Holographic SoundField’ tech"
excerpt: "The details of that: a firm called International Consolidated Companies, Inc (INCC) has acquired Soundtech AI for “$150 million of preferred X stock” (i.e. no cash has changed hands). The announcement also outlines the basics of the startup’s ‘Holographic SoundField’ technology in effusive terms."
